text: Paul Wass (July 7, 1925 â€“ December 13, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives from 1977 to 1990. Wass was born in Young Township, Pennsylvania. Wass died on December 13, 2020 in Indiana, Pennsylvania at the age of 95.Paul Wass obituary ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the Pennsylvania General Assembly Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
